presentation.label: Digi Tank Kit presentation
presentation.description:
iDigi Tank Kit presentation.
This presentation works over the XBib device toggling the status of the LED1 and LED2 (which represent the tank valves) when pressing Button 1 and Button 2 of the device.
It will subscribe the XBib Button 1 and Button 2 channels to detect when they have been pressed, and, depending on the button pressed it will toggle the corresponding XBib LED:
Button 1: Toggles XBib LED 1 (Input valve) Button 2: Toggles XBib LED 2 (Output valve)
